name: Rugby Duel
description:
BECOME THE GREATEST RUGBY KICKER IN THE WORLD!
Dan Carter, Jonny Wilkinson, Leigh Halfpenny, Ronald O’Gara…
Time has come for you to be part of this hall of fame.
And it happens there, on Rugby Kicker World Challenge!

A GAME EASY TO PLAY...
One single finger is enough to perform atomic kicks!

… BUT NOT SO EASY TO MASTER!
Only those who can overcome the wind, the obstacles and their own weaknesses will become true legends.

PLAY WITH YOUR FRIENDS
> Challenge your friends and show them who’s the boss
> Team up with them during special events (coming soon)
> Hire them in your personal staff (coming soon)

CHALLENGE THE WHOLE WORLD
> On the World Map, challenge opponents from around the world.
> Face them during exciting 1-on-1 kicking battles
> Rank up and aim for the top
> Represent your country in international fixtures
> Show the world who’s the new rugby legend

STADIUMS & GAME MODES
> Many stadiums and cool places
> Several weather effects (more to come)
> Special obstacles




Stay tuned to keep informed about upcoming updates:
Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/gaminho.community
Twitter : @gaminho_mobile
